title: Basic Jungle Masteries
body: Hey, so I want to get into jungling but I don't want masteries for each individual champ. I was hoping for some basic masteries that I could apply to a wide range of champions. Anyone got anything?

replies.body: Any recommendations for AP and Tank jungle?

http://i.gyazo.com/4fc80dfe6495f6145e592dea1b38bb49.png
I use that exact page for Lee, Vi, Kha, Jarv, Wukong and Panth.
Ooooh I like it that'd be perfect for my more AD focused junglers! ^^ Arigato!

i suggest getting the reduced damage from champs instead of the regen. and CDR over attack speed or the heal on unit kill, especially for CDR reliant tanky AD like wukong panth and vi. even kha and J4.
Thats a pretty solid Mastery Page for those junglers.
